name: AppFutura
tag_list: mobile, marketplace, app, developers, projects, hire
description: Connecting mobile app projects with devs
overview:
AppFutura is a marketplace where mobile platform app developers can meet people or companies that are looking for someone to develop an app project.

Mobile app developers can register and create a professional profile, browse interesting new projects, make offers to develop them, manage payments and get valuable recommendations from clients that help build up their reputation as developers, all for free.

If you have a project in mind, AppFutura makes it easier for you to find and hire the best mobile app developers or designers for the job.
